website_summaries.verdict: With its stampeding styracosaurus, savage tyrannosaurus, and tons of other giant reptiles, this high-end coloring book is the ultimate gift for young or young-at-heart dinosaur fans.
pros: Artwork that inspired “The Land Before Time” and “Jurassic Park
cons: Unfortunately, its pages are not perforated
Illustrations are printed on both sides of the page

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for coloring... that is, if dare to start
customer_reviews.text: Of all the coloring books that are available for the zen art of minimizing concentration with a fun distraction, this is the one to have. The only problem is the drawings are so beautiful it's hard to risk messing them up. Still, just dive in! Stout's designs are such that they're easy to follow and have fun with but they are also so well realized that it's hard to mess them up. Have fun and don't worry about coloring out of the lines. These images can take it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous. You might not want to color them in!
customer_reviews.text: A lovely collection of some of Stout's black and white work, clean and ready for your markers, colored pencils, and eyes. Some of the images will be familiar to Stout fans—they're drawings from his Convention Sketches series or the black and white line work that he colored with inks and the like for his dinosaur books. Other images are new. All of them are lush and detailed. The age range of the images stretches from the '70s to just a few years back, pretty much covering Stout's entire career. They're great pictures, colored or not, and it's nice to see Stout delivering a book that highlights his skills with the pen.
customer_reviews.author: Diplocaulus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Detailed.
customer_reviews.text: I got this and it was SO BEAUTIFUL it felt like a crime to color in it didnt want to mess up the gorgeous black and white art with color....BUT I also ache to color it....solution....BOUGHT ANOTHER ONE! Its sooo detailed and so gorgeous. I grew up with his book on Dinosaurs so I bought this pretty fast when I learned it existed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic collection of William Stout artwork. In glorious black and white. Contains a mix of older pieces and newer pieces. I think Stout's Dino drawings are the best. Lots of detail and lots of love. Some of the pics tell a story (there's always something happening or about to happen in his pics). Really nice quality publication... the cover stock and toothy paper are second to none. So pretty, I don't want to color it! May have to buy another one....highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando H. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Nice paper , thick takes color well
customer_reviews.text: The book itself is nice quality paper and takes color well but some of the artwork is cartoonish - I should have checked out the book better before purchasing but will enjoy coloring some of it.
customer_reviews.author: NetteD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful drawings,even some hilarious ones that are also beautifully done.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 48 yr old nephew who's into paleontology. He's going to LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: suzy

customer_reviews.title: very detailed coloring
customer_reviews.text: the detail on this book is great but was more detail than my 7 year old son was able to handle. will save the book for when he is much older if he is still interested in dinasoures. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this coloring book
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful book. Really it is!! Beautiful detailed dinos to color for my avid dinosaur lover!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Elmer

customer_reviews.title: an incredible journey
customer_reviews.text: this coloring book allows you to bring Stout's incredible illustrations to life- your way! Stout's work never disappoints, enjoi!!
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Stout + Dinosaurs = Winning Combination.
customer_reviews.text: Love this artist. Great drawings that kids and adults will appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love dinosaurs? I've been looking for a realistic dino ...
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love dinosaurs? I've been looking for a realistic dino coloring book for a while. And this is gold, right here. The artwork is amazing! All you need is your imagination and some coloring tools.
customer_reviews.author: Saraya Uitvlugt

customer_reviews.title: So good I don't want to color it.
customer_reviews.text: Great artwork. Worth having if only to admire the wonderful illustrations.
customer_reviews.author: ION STEPANEK

customer_reviews.title: Not really my thing
customer_reviews.text: Good if you want to color super detailed images.. not great if you like feeling like you have a lot of flexibility in how you color it
customer_reviews.author: alex m bockey

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully done!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous illustrations with detailed descriptions of all the dinosaurs categorized by time period in the back. He added lovingly detailed little doodles to color even on the index pages. I'm so excited to color this beautiful book! Definitely worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Jane

product_meta.title: Dinosaurs: A Coloring Book by William Stout
